name: Class BasicControl
text:
This class provides a basic implementation of the Control
 interface. It represents an LDAPv3 Control as defined in
 RFC 2251.
codes:
public class BasicControl
extends Object
implements Control

fields.description: The control's ASN.1 BER encoded value.

methods.description: Retrieves the control's object identifier string.

Retrieves the control's ASN.1 BER encoded value.
 The result includes the BER tag and length for the control's value but
 does not include the control's object identifier and criticality setting.
